messages.message: I used it at my previous job, it was nice for multi-step account opening flows to see where people dropped off
also had looked into using fullstory at the time which can provide visual playback of a user session without revealing sensitive information

Yeah I want to try using it to track adoption of new features, get some more info about how people are using Build, and see where people are dropping off at onboarding and upsell points. Let me know if you're interested in doing this for the hackathon @Liam Callanan!!
Iâ€™ve also used logrocket before, which is very similar, and liked it a lot!
Logrocket is more for collecting log and error info and session replay though, right?
yes, it provides lower-level info for sure

I have been advocating for faro for sometime now. Once done, this is a win for everyone :tada:

Newrelic is also worth exploring, I've used it sometime back. Still Faro could be better as it will be part of Grafana which we are already using for observing backends
